name: derby-select2
description: Native Derby JS replacement for jQuery Select2

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean;touch .create_stash && git stash save --include-untracked "npm build stash";npm test || { npm run postbuild; exit 1; };
scripts.build: export DEST=dist;export SOURCES='*.js';export VIEWS='*.html';export ASSETS='.*.scss|./README.md|./package.json';export IGNORE="./$DEST|./test|./node_modules";echo "[01;32mCompiling and minifying...[00m";find -regextype posix-egrep -regex $IGNORE -prune -o -name "$SOURCES" -print0| xargs -n1 -P8 -0 sh -c 'echo $0...;mkdir -p "$DEST/`dirname $0`";babel "$0" | uglifyjs - -cm -o "$DEST/$0"';echo "[01;32mMinifying views...[00m";find -regextype posix-egrep -regex $IGNORE -prune -o -name "$VIEWS" -print0| xargs -n1 -P8 -0 sh -c 'echo "$0 -> $DEST/$0";mkdir -p "$DEST/`dirname $0`";html-minifier --config-file .html-minifierrc -o "$DEST/$0" "$0"'| column -t -c 3;echo "[01;32mCopying assets...[00m";find -regextype posix-egrep -regex $IGNORE -prune -o -regex $ASSETS -print0| xargs -n1 -0 sh -c 'echo "$0 -> $DEST/$0";mkdir -p "$DEST/`dirname "$0"`";cp -a "$0" "$DEST/$0"'| column -t -c 3;echo "[01;32mDone![00m";
scripts.release: npm run build; cd dist; npm publish;
